Html:
Hi guys!

I want to change from COM to this libary to create an invoice with PHP. In the invoice I use a table for a detailed position of the costs. But, because they aren't constant, the number of rows varies each time. Therefore I have to add a Row in the table and write the text in it. Unfortunatly I couldn't manage to add a row in my template.

I have already tried some things to make this thing working, and I've looked into the documentation but I still don't know where to start with... .

Am I blind and didn't see the documentation? Do you have any suggestinos?

 

so far

choallin
